name: Internet consumption Record Report
query:
select 
    `tabInternet consumption Record`.internet_service_provider as "Internet Service Provider:Select/Network Provider",
    `tabInternet consumption Record`.data_usage as "Data Usage (Gb):Float/Data Usage (Gb)",
    `tabInternet consumption Record`.siteschool_name as "Site School name:Data/Site School name",
    `tabInternet consumption Record`.district as "District:Data/District",
     `tabInternet consumption Record`.monthly_bill_amount as "Monthly Bill amount:Float/Monthly Bill Amount",
    count(siteschool_name) as "Total School"
from `tabInternet consumption Record`
Group by 'siteschool_name';
